custom-sql.sql: SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_payment_file LEFT JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_payment_file.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId LEFT JOIN opencps_acc_citizen ON opencps_payment_file.ownerUserId = opencps_acc_citizen.mappingUserId LEFT JOIN opencps_acc_business ON opencps_payment_file.ownerOrganizationId = opencps_acc_business.mappingOrganizationId WHERE (1 = 1) AND ((lower(opencps_dossier.receptionNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_payment_file.paymentName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_acc_citizen.fullName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_acc_business.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])) AND (opencps_payment_file.paymentStatus = ?) AND opencps_payment_file.govAgencyOrganizationId = ?

SELECT * FROM opencps_payment_file LEFT JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_payment_file.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId LEFT JOIN opencps_acc_citizen ON opencps_payment_file.ownerUserId = opencps_acc_citizen.mappingUserId LEFT JOIN opencps_acc_business ON opencps_payment_file.ownerOrganizationId = opencps_acc_business.mappingOrganizationId WHERE 1 = 1 AND ((lower(opencps_dossier.receptionNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_payment_file.paymentName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_acc_citizen.fullName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_acc_business.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])) AND (opencps_payment_file.paymentStatus = ?) AND opencps_payment_file.govAgencyOrganizationId = ? ORDER BY opencps_payment_file.modifiedDate DESC

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_payment_file LEFT JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_payment_file.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId WHERE (1 = 1) AND (opencps_payment_file.ownerUserId=?) AND (opencps_payment_file.ownerOrganizationId=?) AND (lower(opencps_payment_file.paymentName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_payment_file.accountUserName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.receptionNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) AND (opencps_payment_file.paymentStatus = ?)

SELECT * FROM opencps_payment_file LEFT JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_payment_file.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId WHERE (1 = 1) AND (opencps_payment_file.ownerUserId=?) AND (opencps_payment_file.ownerOrganizationId=?) AND (lower(opencps_payment_file.paymentName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_payment_file.accountUserName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.receptionNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) AND (opencps_payment_file.paymentStatus = ?) ORDER BY opencps_payment_file.modifiedDate DESC

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_payment_file LEFT JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_payment_file.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId WHERE (1 = 1) AND (opencps_payment_file.ownerUserId=?) AND (opencps_payment_file.ownerOrganizationId=?) AND (lower(opencps_payment_file.paymentName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_payment_file.accountUserName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.receptionNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) AND (opencps_payment_file.paymentStatus IN (?) )

SELECT * FROM opencps_payment_file LEFT JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_payment_file.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId WHERE (1 = 1) AND (opencps_payment_file.ownerUserId=?) AND (opencps_payment_file.ownerOrganizationId=?) AND (lower(opencps_payment_file.paymentName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_payment_file.accountUserName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.receptionNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) AND (opencps_payment_file.paymentStatus IN (?) ) ORDER BY opencps_payment_file.modifiedDate DESC
